DataElement.preferredDefinition: the date of the assessment of myelodysplastic syndrome (MDS; a clonal hematopoietic disorder characterized by dysplasia and ineffective hematopoiesis in one or more of the hematopoietic cell lines).

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to assessment of myelodysplastic syndrome (MDS; a clonal hematopoietic disorder characterized by dysplasia and ineffective hematopoiesis in one or more of the hematopoietic cell lines).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Myelodysplastic syndrome (MDS) is a clonal hematopoietic disorder characterized by dysplasia and ineffective hematopoiesis in one or more of the hematopoietic cell lines.  The dysplasia may be accompanied by an increase in myeloblasts, but the number is less than 20%, which, according to the WHO guidelines, is the requisite threshold for the diagnosis of acute myeloid leukemia.  MDS may occur de novo or as a result of exposure to alkylating agents and/or radiotherapy.  (WHO, 2001) -- 2003

Concepts.definition: A clonal hematopoietic disorder characterized by dysplasia and ineffective hematopoiesis in one or more of the hematopoietic cell lines. The dysplasia may be accompanied by an increase in myeloblasts, but the number is less than 20%, which, according to the WHO guidelines, is the requisite threshold for the diagnosis of acute myeloid leukemia. It may occur de novo or as a result of exposure to alkylating agents and/or radiotherapy. (WHO, 2001)

Property.preferredDefinition: The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: dates on which diagnostic, pathologic, and clinical assessments were made.
ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: 11/17/21 changed WS from Retired Deleted to Retired Archived and added end date. Workflow status set to "Retired Deleted" in 3.0 deployment, was previously Deleted using the Admin Tool "Delete" function key. This function is no longer available.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
